1caf5a4a-c952-4c13-9631-7411e85874e2.label: FIFA Women's World Cup Original Trophy

features.Unique Design: The trophy features a spiral design with a golden football at the top, symbolizing the dynamic nature and elegance of women’s football.
features.Historical Significance: This trophy was the first to be awarded in the inaugural FIFA Women's World Cup, held in China in 1991, marking a significant milestone in the recognition of women's football globally.

rel_1.label: Current FIFA Women's World Cup Trophy

properties.description: The original trophy was replaced by a new design introduced in 1999, which is currently used for the FIFA Women's World Cup.
